short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now you can 'extend' your time to things other than parallel and series calculations... see what I did there :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is targeted towards engineering students is a simple equivalent resistor(capacitor and inductor) calculator. Currently it takes two element values and calculates the equivalent of the two (both in series and parallel). This is useful as a study tool to help get simple calculations out of the way as you try to learn the rest of your course material,
